resources.string: Hey! I\'m using Cowabunga notifications! it\'s awesome!

I\'m using Cowabunga Notifications, one new application that generates rich notifications when screen is blocked.\n\n You must try it! it\'s so awesome: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.forlayo.cowabunga
To get Cowabunga Notifications working you need to activate our accessibility service. Press our shortcut button and activate it simply!
Show recent notifications below the current one
Shows notification screen with minimum screen bright for energy saving
Because we\'re showing info from other apps in our notifications, it\'s a trick :)
Android says that Cowabunga can recover sensitive data from my phone!

Android says that because Cowabunga is using an accessibility service, like when doing a reader for blind people. You\'re completly safe as our app doesn\'t send any data from it and uses this just for generating the notifications.
Anyway, as a demostration of safety, this app is opensource and you can check by yourself what\'s doing having a look on the source code in this code repository: https://github.com/forlayo/cowabunga
do you have more doubts or an special request?
I\'ll be really happy of attend your comments on Google Play or through my developer email.
